short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fuzzy search your bookmarks through the Omnibox

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Omnimarkr is an Omnibox enhancement for full-page searching of your bookmarks. Instead of only being able to search the titles of your bookmarks, now the entire pages are indexed automatically. Simply type 'bookmarks' in your Omnibox, hit tab, and away you go!
